# Risk Analysis of the Canadian Maritime Fleet
=============

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-4037-877756
* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-220645
* **Publication Date**: March 1, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: April 24, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Number**: 8

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **UNSPSC**: 25110000 (Marine transport), 81100000 (Professional engineering services), 81101506 (Naval architecture), 81101606 (Marine engineering), 81141801 (Safety or risk analysis)

### Description

Transport Canada Marine Safety and Security (TCMSS) seeks a comprehensive risk analysis of the Canadian maritime fleet. The successful bidder will provide a detailed report assessing risk criteria and developing a framework for determining vessel inspection priorities. The priorities should consider factors such as vessel types, size, voyage, crew profiles, Transportation Safety Board (TSB) reports, and historical non-compliance.

### Deliverables

* Monthly status updates one month after contract award
* Summary of preliminary findings and outline of report
* Draft report two months after delivering the summary of preliminary findings and outline of report
* Final report four weeks after reception of TC Project Authority review comments on the draft report

### Attachment

The request for proposal, including all amendments, is available on the Government procurement website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
